word: THERE IS REASON TO BELIEVE THAT DURING THE LAST THIRTY YEARS, MORE THAN ONE HUNDRED THOUSAND DOLLARS HAS BEEN LOST BY OUR BRETHREN THROUGH THEIR INVESTMENTS IN MINES AND MINING STOCK, AND IN VARIOUS MANUFACTURING ENTERPRISES, WHICH HAVE BEEN RECOMMENDED BY THEIR FRIENDS AS PROVIDENTIAL OPPORTUNITIES TO ACQUIRE MEANS RAPIDLY FOR THE FURTHERANCE OF THE GOSPEL.
